# `ConversationContentWheelPickerItem` Definition

Represents a selectable item in a Wheel Picker

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | Unique identifier for the wheel picker item |
| title | `string` | Yes | The main text displayed for the item. |
| value | `string` | No | The value of the item. |
